exhibit.description: Roosevelt STAY High School offers a variety of courses for adults (ages 18 and over) who wish to continue their education or participate in a specialized training program.  We are committed to delivering a quality academic and career/technical program within an alternative school environment that will help students obtain their high school diploma or GED, or advance their career.
exhibit.transit: 52, 53, 54 (14th Street Line), 60 (Fort Totten-Petworth Line), 62, 63 (Takoma-Petworth Line), 70, 71 (Georgia Avenue-7th Street Line), 79 (Georgia Avenue Metro Extra Line)
